title: Redox kinetics of ceria–zirconia (Ce1−xZrxO2−δ) for thermochemical partial oxidation of methane and H2O/CO2 splitting at moderate temperature
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,942-956
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01509B, Paper
Yanxin Liu, Shuting Cen, Changsheng Bu, Daoyin Liu, Guilin Piao
The utilization of ceria-based solar thermochemical cycles presents a practical approach for converting solar energy into chemical materials. The integration of the redox cycle with partial oxidation of CH4 proves to be a straightforward approach.
